OBCQL_WIDGET_QUERY.HQL: select q.documentStatus as Status, case when count(*) > 0 then round((cast((count(*) *100) as big_decimal)/ (select count(*) from Order q2 where q2.documentStatus in ('CA', 'CJ') and q2.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and @optional_filters@))) else round(cast(0 as big_decimal)) end || '%' as Percentage, count(*) as Total from Order q where q.documentStatus in ('CA', 'CJ') and q.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and @optional_filters@ group by q.documentStatus
